name: Satella Walker: Sate Bou o Sukuidase!
overview: SatellaWalker (also known by its shorthand, SW) is a Downloadable 2-part Soundlink game for the Satellaview that was broadcast between June 29, 1997 and January 2, 1998. The game's January broadcast was the result of having been the first winner of the third Player's Choice vote. SatellaWalker was followed by a sequel, SatellaWalker 2 in February 1998.
